entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 7.
